summary:
This mod adds the Fairy Tail Guild  from the famous Manga \"FariyTail\" to Skyrim
It will include The guild and some other places, along with the characters and quests
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone, 
*******
Sorry for the long silence :)
The mod isnt dead iam just very busy
Next update will be in June ;)
******

I want to introduce my current mod project... 

Content of that mod is the Fairy Tail guild from the anime \"Fairy Tail\" 

****************************************************************************
to report ideas, bugs and critism check the mod group 
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/FairyTailmod 
**************************************************************************

We are also recruiting :) if you have ideas  tell us


-------------------------------------------------------- 
LATEST NEWS 

UPDATE 01.0%.2013 

Bugfixes and improvements 
new apachii hair support
some dialogues
-------------------------------------------------------- 


PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT 
ITS A BETA AND IT WILL BE WORKED ON IT

Introduction: 

\"The guild never was realy big, but we always could fend for ourself. 
We filled the gap between the mages and warrior guilds, took the job which were too specialized for other guilds, or simply not profitable enough. 
We had more than enough contracts, but then everything changed.... 
First the Thalmor came with their rules and prohibitons, and only a few years later a bloody civil war broke out. 
In this time we had to many guildmembers and friend off to Sovengarde, and the 
Our guild, no our home were on the brink of destruction and our situation were hopeless. 
Then in our darkest our lady Luck smiled at us, an young adventurer appeared and joined us 
This hero later was known all over the world as...Dragonborn\" 

Taken from the guild chronicle, Victoria Mhianadóra, Guildmaster 4Ä 233 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

THE GUILD IS LOCATED SOUTH OF WHITERUN NEAR THE WATCHTOWER 


The content of the mod: 

- The guild compound 
- A Guildhall 
- A Guild dorm 
- A guild cave for herbs 
- 9 guild member/ 4 of them can be follower 
- A reward system working with guildmarks 
- different random quests 
- A guildrobe 
- A hot spring :) 
- Aria the bard 
- 2 merchants 

Future plans: 

- working navmesh (have some problems wih them) 
- New spells and shouts ( 5 spells are done) 
- short bookes 
- Story Quests 
- Guild Amor 

Characters: 

Marianne Mhianadóra --> Guildmaster aand battlemage 
Fink Mhianadóra --> Quartermaster and runemage 
Erza Scarlet --> Champion and weaponmage 
Mr.Whisker/??? --> merchant and Animagus 
Aria Spellsinger--> Guildmember and bard 
Lucy Heartfilia -->Guildmember and Celestialwizard 
Mirajane Strauss-->Barkeeper and Soulmage 
Gray Fullbuster --> Guildmember and Icemage 
Natsu Dragoneel -->Guildmember and Firemage 

Quests: 
The current Quests are random Quests take from the jobposts and the blackboards. 
Kill X in Location Y 
Kill X in Location Y and get item Z back 
Collect 10 Units of Z 

Next thing i will do are story quests. 
These will be quests about the other guild members and their history 


1.Marianne ---> Quest \"together we stand...\"---> Power \"Fairy Law\" 
2.Fink ---> Quest \"Signs of Magic\"---> Spell \"Fairy Runes\" 
3.Erza ---> Quest \"Demons of the past\" ---> Spell \"Re-equip\" 
4.Mirajane ---> Quest \"Godspeed for beginners\" ---> Power \"Flight of a Mustang\" 
5.Aria ---> Quest \" Tunes of Wisdom\" ---> Spell \"Tune of the Fairyworld\" 
6.Lucy ---> Quest \"Secrets are never told\" ---> Power \"Fairy Door\" 
7.Whisker ---> Quest \"The Pinewood Menance\" ---> Spell \"Wooden Bolt\" 
8. Natsu ----> Quest \"Destroying for Freshmen\" 


I hope you guys have some interesting ideas or tips :) 
Iam always open for critism 


to report ideas, bugs and critism check the mod group 
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/FairyTailmod 



I hope you like it... 

in this spirit .... 

AYE SIR !!! 
****************PROBLEMS****************************************************************** 

After updates something not showing up, please try to disable the mod , save and enable it again 
there may be problems with textures but iam already working on it

******************REQUIREMENTS********************************************************** 

Apachiis Hairmod

************************************************************************************************** 



**********************Recomended********************************************************** 

Any Mod for better faces for vanilla races 



******************THANKS*********************************************************************
To Appachi for her amazing Hair mod and the permisiion to use it
author: LindayWolf
